name: Cutre Jam Platformer
description:
This is my submition at The Godot 2MB Challenge. Right now the game is playable but has no end defined and there's no sound.

It's a simple platformer with spikes, bombs, death and checkpoints. Easy to play and fun (or so I hope).

The game is not optimized and maybe you will encounter some (not anoying) bug. You can play with keyboard or Xbox pad. 

Made with Godot 3.1, all was done by me except the font that can be found at: 

https://www.fontspace.com/family-font-mart/gbboot

So I hope you enjoy the game.

Cutre Studio.
